en.description: I design and develop experiences that make people's lives simpler through Web and Mobile apps. I work with Figma, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative, and Flutter.

ru.description: Я проектирую и разрабатываю опыт, который упрощает жизнь людей через веб- и мобильные приложения. Я работаю с Figma, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative и Flutter.

uz.greeting: Salom, mening ismim Charlz, Front-end Developer
uz.description: Insonlar hayotini oddiy qilishda yordam beradigan tajribalarni dizayn qilish va rivojlanstirishni loyihalayman. Figma, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative va Flutter bilan ishlashni o'rganmoqdamiz.
